headline: CLC Lodging Becomes Corpay Lodging: More Power, Same Trusted Solution and Savings
summary: WICHITA, Kan., April 08, 2025--CLC Lodging, the leader in workforce travel lodging solutions, is rebranding as Corpay Lodging. The transition strengthens the company’s alignment with its parent brand, Corpay, a global leader in corporate payments, while reaffirming its commitment to providing the most comprehensive and cost-effective lodging programs in the industry.
